issue.title: N3988 Towards restrict-like aliasing semantics for C++ N3635 Towards restrict-like semantics for C++
issue.submitter: Hal Finker, Hubert Tong, M. Wong, R. Silvera, R. Mak, C. Cambly, et al.

discussion.p: According to Wong, this paper was reviewed on the last day in EWG in Chicago 2013, although with no recorder. The summary was that many people liked the 1st solution (AliasGrouping), and authors are encouraged to develop it further.
